reviewText: What could be better than repeated shots of buildings imploding, over and over and over again.  Its sort of creepy, but my two year old worships this video.  "Buildings on Fire!" he exclaims, demanding it, or singing the theme song: "...And when its a wreck that noone will buy, we take it down, down, down..."  I don't know whether to be worried that this video is turning him into an arsonist, or pleased that it is creating an engineer.
